vara dānam āha
śrutvā etat yājñavalkyaḥ pi prīta ātmā muni bhāṣitam

original: evam astv iti hovāca namaskṛtya svayaṃbhuve // YDh_3.334
analyzed: evam astu iti ha uvāca namaskṛtya svayaṃbhuve

original: etad ṛṣibhir bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā yogīndro 'pi svanirmitadharmaśāstradhāraṇādiphalaprārthanonmīlitamukhapaṅkajaḥ svayaṃbhuve
analyzed: etat ṛṣibhiḥ bhāṣitam śrutvā yogi indraḥ pi sva nirmita dharma śāstra dhāraṇa ādi phala prārthana unmīlita mukha paṅkajaḥ svayaṃbhuve

original: brahmaṇe namaskṛtya praṇamya bhavatprārthitaṃ sakalam itthaṃ bhavatu ity evaṃ kila bhagavān babhāṣe // 3.334 //
analyzed: brahmaṇe namaskṛtya praṇamya bhavat prārthitam sakalam ittham bhavatu iti evam kila bhagavān babhāṣe  /
iti śrī bhāradvāja padmanābha bhaṭṭa upādhyāya ātmajasya śrīmat paramahaṃsa parivrājaka vijñāneśvara bhaṭṭārakasya kṛtau ṛjumitākṣarāyām yājñavalkya dharmaśāstra vivṛttau
prāyaścitta adhyāyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ
atha atra adhyāya anukramaṇikā likhyate
tatra ādyam sūtaka prakraraṇam
āpad dharma prakaraṇam
vānaprastha prakaraṇam
adhyātma prakaraṇam
tatas prāyaścitta prakaraṇam
tatra ādau karma vipākaḥ
mahāpātaka prāyaścittāni
ātideśika sahitāni
upapātaka prāyaścittāni
prakīrṇaka prāyaścitta prakaraṇam
vrata grahaṇa vidhiḥ
rahasya prāyaścitta adhikāraḥ
kṛcchra ādi lakṣaṇam
iti prakaraṇāni
uttama upapadasya iyam śiṣyasya kṛtiḥ ātmanaḥ
dharma śāstrasya vivṛtiḥ rvijñāna īśvara yoginaḥ

original: iti yājñavalkyamuniśāstragatā vivṛtir na kasya vihitā viduṣaḥ /
analyzed: iti yājñavalkya muni śāstra gatā vivṛtiḥ na kasya vihitā viduṣaḥ
pramitā akṣarā api vipulā arthavatī pariṣiñcati śravaṇayoḥ amṛtam
gambhīrābhiḥ prasannābhiḥ vāgbhiḥ nyastā mita akṣarā
analpa arthābhiḥ alpābhiḥ vivṛtiḥ vihitā mayā

original: nāsīd asti bhaviṣyati kṣititale kalyāṇakalpaṃ puraṃ
analyzed: na āsīt asti bhaviṣyati kṣiti tale kalyāṇa kalpam puram

original: no dṛṣṭaḥ śruta eva vā kṣitipatiḥ śrīvikramārkopamaḥ /
analyzed: no dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ eva vā kṣitipatiḥ śrīvikrama arka upamaḥ
vijñāneśvara paṇḍitaḥ na bhajate kiñca anyat anya upamaḥ

original: cālpaṃ sthiram astu kalpalatikākalpaṃ tad etat trayam // 4 //

sraṣṭā vācām madhura vapuṣām vidvat āścarya sīmnām
dāta arthānām atiśaya juṣām arthi sārtha arthanāyāḥ
dhyātā murteḥ mura vijayinaḥ
jetā arīṇām tattva vijñāna nāthaḥ

original: ā setoḥ kīrtirāśe raghukulatilakasyā ca śailādhirājā-
analyzed: ā setoḥ kīrti rāśeḥ raghu kula tilakasya ca śaila adhirājā
ca pratyak payodheḥ caṭula timi kula uttuṅga riṅgat taraṅgāt
ā ca prācaḥ samudrāt nata nṛpati śiraḥ ratna bhā bhāsura aṅghriḥ
pāyāt ācandratāram jagat idam akhilam vikramādityadevaḥ  /
